data.description:
- MOVE LIKE GORILLA - physics based movement
- 20 BRUTAL LEVELS and more - if you can beat them all
- MULTIPLAYER - compete with friends

...and

- DUAL SHOTGUNS - can even launch yourself by firing
- DUAL GRAPPLE HOOKS - fly and pull yourself towards enemies
- DUAL CHAINSAWS!
- RAGDOLL PHYSICS - knock enemies them down or send them flying
- SANDBOX MODE - with infinite possibilities!
- RETRO BOOMER-SHOOTER PIXEL ART STYLE 
- METAL and CLASSICAL soundtrack
- UNLOCKABLE SKINS
- BOSS FIGHT!!!

Prepare to unleash your inner beast as you embark on an epic demon-slaying rampage. Engage in heart-pounding battles across a series of challenging levels, each filled with relentless demons thirsting for your destruction!

changelog.change_log:
Version 2.6
Moved Chainsword Unlock to level 2
Made Level 18, 19, 20 lasers slower
Fixed Multiplayer skin bug where players can use skins which they haven't unlocked

Added:
Multiplayer Skins 
Bounciness number
Removed Stick Drift in Multiplayer due to Chainsword bug
Moved Sandbox to unlock at Level 1

Added a 3 second invincibility buffer to Multiplayer respawn
Reordered Level 18, 19, 20 difficulty
Decreased Gargoyle Flame Breath damage
Increased Toilet Crown punishment threshold to a 15 lose streak
Added Boss Fight player skin reward

Added a 3 second invincibility buffer to Multiplayer respawn
Reordered Level 18, 19, 20 difficulty
Decreased Gargoyle Flame Breath damage
Increased Toilet Crown punishment threshold to a 15 lose streak
Added Boss Fight player skin reward
Added: Multiplayer and Original Player Skin

Nerfed Lasers
Added Pride Month Player Skin

1. Added Phase 3 with Cutscene
2. fixed bug where player and weapon skins don't appear in the boss fight

Version 2.33
-Added Level 18, 19, 20
-Butter Smooth cutting of Abyss Dweller leg tentacles
-Fixed column drifting bug

1. Added Level 17 featuring the Abyss Dweller
2. Decreased Level 13 Gargoyle health
Added Level 16 featuring the Orbital Watcher
April Fools Player and Shotgun skin
NEW LEVEL 15 featuring the LASER WATCHER enemy!
New LEVEL 14 featuring THE WATCHER enemy!
Dragun Shotgun Skin Release

Version 2.21

Added:
1. SKELEGUN Shotgun Skin Challenge at Level 5
2. Fixed level ending before last enemy killed bug
3. Less smooth-turning jittering

Version 2.10

Added:
1. Fixed Grenade push bug 
2. Added Gargoyle damage textures indicating health
3. Made grenade launcher only available after level 13 
4. Gargoyle stuns when hit
5. Fixed Quest 3 avatar head clipping bug

Version 2.00

Added:
NEW Level 13
FREE Snow Rilla Skin
Boss Fight PREVIEW after Level 12
Sandbox unlocks after Level 5
Added Grenade Launcher in Sandbox
Grapple Aim Highlight on enemies
Classical Music mode
Added Grenade Launcher in Sandbox
Added Phase 2 of Vordir Boss Fight
Added PHASE 2 of Vordir Boss Fight
